summary: This document is an email chain between an Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York and other parties regarding the technical logistics of uploading subpoenaed documents from the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner to the Relativity e-discovery platform for the case US v. Epstein. It details folder structures and specific files to include or exclude, such as DVD video interview files.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of several emails coordinating the upload of subpoenaed documents from Boies Schiller to the Relativity platform for the US v. Epstein case.

events.title: Boies Schiller first subpoena response
events.description: The law firm Boies Schiller Flexner produces documents in response to a subpoena from the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Boies Schiller second subpoena response
events.description: Boies Schiller Flexner provides a second production of documents in response to a subpoena from the SDNY investigation.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Boies Schiller second subpoena response (follow-up)
events.description: Additional documents are received from Boies Schiller Flexner as part of the second subpoena response production.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is part of the discovery process for US v. Epstein (USAO #2018R01618), showing the SDNY's active evidence collection in 2019.
The law firm Boies Schiller Flexner was served with at least two subpoenas (in March and April 2019) and produced documents and video files in response.

The evidence included video interviews labeled 'Interview H', 'Interview J', 'Interview S', 'Interview A. D', and 'Interview A. T', which were stored in a DVD file structure and required special handling for the e-discovery platform.

The correspondence shows meticulous attention to the digital organization of evidence, specifying exact folder paths and excluding certain technical files (like DVD information and original ZIPs) from the main review platform.
The email chain confirms the investigation's code name or folder structure as 'InvestigationV4 2018 SDNY investigation'.
